process.name: Test Web API Config (Action - Headers Parameters)

input.name: Header - Name
input.narrative: The name that you want to give the header.

input.name: Header - Value
input.narrative: The value you want to give the header.

input.name: Expected Header - Name
input.narrative: The name of the Header you are expecting.

input.name: Expected Header - Value
input.narrative: The value of the Header you are expecting.

input.name: Expected Fail?
input.narrative: False as default. True or False do you expect the header to not exist.

input.name: Header - Name
input.narrative: The name of the Header you want to edit.

input.name: Header - Value
input.narrative: The value you want to give the header.

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the Web API you want to select.

input.name: Expected Header - Name
input.narrative: The name of the Header you are expecting.

input.name: Expected Header - Value
input.narrative: The value of the Header you are expecting.

input.name: Expected Fail?
input.narrative: False as default. True or False do you expect the header to not exist.

input.name: Action Name
input.narrative: The name of the action you want to add the header to.

input.name: Headers or Parameters
input.narrative: Enter either "Headers" of "Paramerters" depending which you want to select.

input.narrative: Default is true. True or False do you want to expose the parameter to the process.

field.name: Date

input.name: Parameter - Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the parameter.

input.name: Parameter - Description
input.narrative: The description you want to give the parameter.

input.name: Parameter - Value
input.narrative: The value you want to use for the parameter. Use the import collection feature in your collection to get the schema.

input.name: Expose?
input.narrative: Default is true. True or False do you want to expose the parameter to the process.

input.name: Parameter - Data Tyoe
input.narrative: The data type you want to set for the parameter.

input.narrative: The name you want to give the parameter.

input.narrative: The description you want to give the parameter.

input.narrative: Default is true. True or False do you want to expose the parameter to the process.

input.name: Expected Fail?
input.narrative: False as default. True or False do you expect the parameter to not exist.

input.narrative: The data type you are expecting to see for the parameter,

input.name: Expected Initial Value
input.narrative: The value you expect for the parameter. Use the import collection feature in your collection to get the schema.

input.name: Parameter - Name
input.narrative: The name of the parameter you want to edit.

input.name: Set Parameter - Description?
input.narrative: False as default. True or false do you want to set the description?

input.name: Parameter - Description
input.narrative: The description you want to give the parameter.

input.name: Set Parameter - Value?
input.narrative: False as default. True or false do you want to set the value?

input.name: Set Expose?
input.narrative: False as default. True or false do you want to change the expose?

input.name: Expose?
input.narrative: Default is true. True or False do you want to expose the parameter to the process.

input.name: Set Parameter - Data Type
input.narrative: False as default. True or False, do you want to set the data tyoe.

input.name: Parameter - Data Type
input.narrative: The name of the data type you want to set,

input.narrative: The name you want to give the parameter.

input.narrative: The name of the parameter you want to remove

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Collection Name
input.narrative: The name of the collection to act upon

field.name: Item Name
field.description: The name of the item that needs cleaning up.

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection to be reversed.

exception.detail: "You have entered a clean up item the choice doesn't recognise."

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the Web API you want to select.

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name you want to give the Web API.

input.name: Base URL
input.narrative: The base URL you want to give the Web API.

input.name: Enabled?
input.narrative: Default is True. True or False do you want to enable this Web API.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: The name of the item you want to clean up.
